edited_stories.edited_story_text: Washington D.C. was a beautiful place to visit . the streets were filled with people who came to visit like i did . the locals were very friendly and helped me find places to go to. the streets were crowded with people wanting to check out the sights and the marches . the buildings were tall and majestic, and they were lovely to look at .

edited_stories.edited_story_text: the city was a beautiful place to visit . the streets were filled with people . the locals were very friendly . the streets were crowded with people . the buildings were tall and majestic .I'm so glad I paid a visit to this beautiful city. There were so many people walking through the streets. The locals were really down to earth and friendly. The streets were getting crowded! I'll never forget how tall and majestic the buildings were.
